Package de.joemiagroup.krawumm

Class main

java.lang.Object
de.joemiagroup.krawumm.main
Record Components:
experimentList - contains all released experiments
userList - contains all registered users
formsList - contains all unconfirmed forms
public class main
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the class which holds the main functions which can be used by everybody (including none registered users). Functions: register, login, search, compare, filter, setter and getter
Author:
Michel Rost

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    main()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void addExperiment​(Experiment experiment)  
    static void addForm​(Form form)  
    static void addUser​(RegisteredUser user)  
    static java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> compare​(java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> resultList, java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> compareList)
    This function is used in the function filter to compare a list of experiments with filters already applied to a list of experiments of a filter which should be added If a experiment of the list with the new filter doesn't exists in the one with the applied filters it doesn't get included into the result list because it doesn't fit the other filters If a experiment of the list with the new filter does exists in the one with the applied filters it stays in the result list(list of applied filters) If a experiment of the list with applied filters doesn't exist in the list with the new filter it gets removed from the result list (list of applied filters) because it doesn't fit the new filter Returns list of experiments which are included in both lists
    static java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> filter​(int age, int difficulty, float finalRating, float duration, int indoorOutdoor)
    This function can filter experiments by age, difficulty, finalRating, duration, indoorOutdoor (multiple filters possible) If all values are 0 the function shows all experiments
    static java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> getExperimentList()  
    static java.util.ArrayList<Form> getFormsList()  
    static java.util.ArrayList<RegisteredUser> getUserList()  
    static void login​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
    This method searches the account which belongs to the email and checks if the password is correct.
    static void register​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
    This method creates a new account if there's no other user with this username or email address
    static java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> search​(java.lang.String searchString)
    This function searches for experiments which have one of the keywords in their names and puts them in a list (checks, that every experiment only gets put in once) Returns list of experiments which are included in both lists
    void showExperiment​(Experiment experiment)

    • register

      public static void register​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      This method creates a new account if there's no other user with this username or email address
      Parameters:
      username - new username has to be unique
      email - new email address has to be unique
      password - new password no return value

    • login

      public static void login​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      This method searches the account which belongs to the email and checks if the password is correct. If so it sets loggedIn to true
      Parameters:
      email - email address of the user who wants to login
      password - password of the user who wants to login no return value

    • search

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> search​(java.lang.String searchString)
      This function searches for experiments which have one of the keywords in their names and puts them in a list (checks, that every experiment only gets put in once) Returns list of experiments which are included in both lists
      Parameters:
      searchString - String of keywords which should be searched
      Returns:
      searchResult List of all experiments which contain one searched keyword in their name

    • showExperiment

      public void showExperiment​(Experiment experiment)

    • compare

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> compare​(java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> resultList, java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> compareList)
      This function is used in the function filter to compare a list of experiments with filters already applied to a list of experiments of a filter which should be added If a experiment of the list with the new filter doesn't exists in the one with the applied filters it doesn't get included into the result list because it doesn't fit the other filters If a experiment of the list with the new filter does exists in the one with the applied filters it stays in the result list(list of applied filters) If a experiment of the list with applied filters doesn't exist in the list with the new filter it gets removed from the result list (list of applied filters) because it doesn't fit the new filter Returns list of experiments which are included in both lists
      Parameters:
      resultList - list of of experiments with one or mor filters already applied
      compareList - list of experiments with a new filter which should be added
      Returns:
      resultList is a list of Experiments which fit all filters(exists in both lists)

    • filter

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> filter​(int age, int difficulty, float finalRating, float duration, int indoorOutdoor)
      This function can filter experiments by age, difficulty, finalRating, duration, indoorOutdoor (multiple filters possible) If all values are 0 the function shows all experiments
      Parameters:
      age - filters for all experiments for this age or below
      difficulty - filters for all experiments with this difficulty or below
      finalRating - filters for all experiments with this rating or above
      duration - filters for all experiments with this duration or below
      indoorOutdoor - filters for all experiments with exactly that inddorOutddor value
      Returns:
      filterList is a list of Experiments which fit the filter configuration
